root.name: Mr. Driller: Drill Till You Drop
root.description: OverviewMr Driller: Drill Till You Drop for the Nintendo DSi adds a number of improved features that enhances the classic Mr. Driller experience. Representing a piece of timeless puzzler gameplay from the arcades of yesteryear, Mr Driller: Drill till you Drop takes the classic gameplay of the series and enhances it with 6 unique characters, over 40 stages, multiple modes and of course dual screen action. In the mission mode, the player digs through ever increasingly deeper or more challenging locales. Time attack mode enable the player to race against the clock to reach the destination. In addition to the mission and time attack mode, the game also features a "Dristone mode" where players drill through labyrinths of stones to collect the Dristones which can be used to gain certain advantages.
